events.name: Driving innovations with hackathons
events.about:
What does Facebook, Startup Weekend / Bootcamp, Google and Foursquare have in common? They use hackathons as a tool to drive innovation!

Silicon Vikings Copenhagen (SVC) would like to invite you to an event about the blueprints of an upcoming Hackathon. In collaboration with the science park Scion DTU, Were working on setting up a Hackathon about healthcare and mobility. Managing Director at Startup Bootcamp Copenhagen, Lars Buch will present the Start-Up Bootcamp concept as well as his experiences with arranging and managing these melting pots of new and alternative ideas in hackathon set-ups. Also, Majken Kramer Overgaaard, Special Advisor at DTU working with innovation and entrepreneurship and Monika Luniewska, Innovation Agent at DTU Photonics will present a roadmap for the upcoming Hackathon leading to Medico Startup weekend. So join us at this casual after-work event at the Danish epicenter of innovative startups, Scion DTU.

Bring nothing but your innovative and ready-to-create mind along with your fellow Silicon Vikings friends and get ready to co-work your way to great elements to include in the Hackathon while networking Silicon Vikings style.    

Program:

17.00 – 17.30             Registration, sandwiches, networking  

17.30 – 18.00             Lars Buch, Managing Director at Startup Bootcamp Copenhagen

18.00 – 18.30             Majken Overgaard, Special Advisor at DTU Chemistry

18.30 – 18.45             Coffee break

18.45 – 19.15             Workgroups on Hackathon topics

19.15 – 19.30             Presentations + wrapup

19.30 – ?                   Networking and drinks     

Event location:

Scion DTU, the Auditorium

Diplomvej 372, 2800 Kgs. Lyngby
